description:
They arrive on the Future Planet, a planet where the existence of the 999 is kept secret. There, Tetsuro`s pass is stolen by a young boy named Taro who dreams of traveling in space. Tetsuro and Maetel search for a place to stay and end up at a cheap hostel where they meet an aspiring comic-artist named Futoshi Adachi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Planet of a Pint Size Room: Part One
大四畳半惑星の幻想 前編
